subject: AW: [junit] ? access current test method name, in setUp() and tearDown()
messageBody:
getName()

> -----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Alain RAVET [mailto:aravet@...]
> Gesendet: Montag, 23. Juli 2001 15:03
> An: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Betreff: [junit] ? access current test method name, in setUp() and
> tearDown()
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the current
> test method,
> when you are in setUp() or tearDown()?
>
>
> Usage :
>
>
> public void tearDown()
> {
> System.out.println ("You have just executed : " +
> <method_name_comes_here> ) ;
> printSomeInfoHere () ;
> }
>
>
> Alain Ravet
> Brussels, Belgium
>
>
